name: Astro-Nautical-(Prototype)
description:
Play as a rocket ship navigating through an asteroid field, attempting to retrieve astronaut friends, while reaching and docking with the station.  

The player will pilot a spacecraft from point A to point B. 

Managing fuel resources to successfully reach their destination. Fuel is a large component, the player applies a force to the craft, an opposite force is needed to cancel momentum. 

Collecting astronauts will increase the player ship’s mass, increasing delta-V cost and ship behavior. 

Coming into contact with asteroids and black holes will result in player death and an End. Reaching the docking station and successfully docking results in a Win and player victory.

Features:

  • Random asteroid generation
  • Fuel
  • Collectibles
  • Player controller
  • Menu UI
  • Hazards
  • Score
